==== requireTwoPropertyAccesses.js (1 errors) ====
    const value = require("./mod").x.y
                          ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2307: Cannot find module './mod' or its corresponding type declarations.
    console.log(value)
    
==== mod.js (0 errors) ====
    module.exports = {
        x: {
            y: "value"
